QuestData.Title: Lunk's Adventure: Rendan's Weakness
QuestData.Description: Lunk not smart, but Lunk notice things. Today, Lunk notice that Mountain-Dwarf likes to watch people dance.$b$bLunk like to dance! $n like to dance! Probably!$b$bMaybe we find some more dwarfs that like to dance. Then we go talk to Mountain-Dwarf, and he will listen to $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with three Iron Summit Guards and ask them to join your dance.
QuestData.RewardText: Did I stutter? I believe I clearly stated that I... won't...$b$bWow, ye've got some good moves there! I'm impressed!

Objectives.Objective: Build up a three-dwarf conga line
